title: Flares
summaries: Flares are a type of ammunition used solely by the Flare Gun. Flares fired from the Flare Gun travel in a slight arc and stick to blocks (similar to Sticky Glowsticks), but have greater velocity and range. They are waterproof, can be fired into and out of water, and emit low-level, flickering, tinted light that lasts for 10 minutes. They stick to the blocks they impacted and will function underwater. Flares cannot be recovered once they burn out.

All types of Flares (except the Cursed Flare) inflict the On Fire! debuff. There is a 66.67*2/3 (66.67%) chance that the debuff will last 5 seconds, and a 33.33*1/3 (33.33%) chance that it will last 10 seconds.
